data.title: Background Changer
data.description: Change the background image visitor page

install.install_code: $this->database()->query("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `" . Phpfox::getT('bgchanger') . "` ( `background_id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `description` mediumtext, `destination` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `server_id` tinyint(3) NOT NULL, `time_stamp` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`background_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM ");
